languages.text: {n}Немезит разъяренно шипит, не замечая, как слабеет хватка на рукояти пистолета:{/n} "Очередной?! Мое имя повторяют во всех отсеках, и я уж точно не какой-то "очередной авантюрист"! Я — твой приговор!"

{n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"
languages.original_text: {n}Немезит разъяренно шипит, не замечая, как слабеет хватка на рукояти пистолета:{/n} "Очередной?! Мое имя повторяют во всех отсеках, и я уж точно не какой-то "очередной авантюрист"! Я — твой приговор!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemesite hisses angrily, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another?! My name is spoken in every compartment, and I am more than "just another opportunist"! I am your death sentence!"

{n}Nemesite hisses angrily, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another?! My name is spoken in every compartment, and I am more than "just another opportunist"! I am your death sentence!"

{n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every compartment. I am more than 'just another opportunist'. I am your death sentence!"

{n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"

{n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"

languages.text: {n}Nemesit zischt verärgert und bemerkt nicht, dass die Waffe in seiner Hand leicht verrutscht ist.{/n} "Nur ein weiterer? Mein Name erklingt wird in jeder Bucht auf diesem Schiff. Ich bin mehr als nur 'ein weiterer Emporkömmling'. Ich bin Eure Todesstrafe!"
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemesit zischt verärgert und bemerkt nicht, dass die Waffe in seiner Hand leicht verrutscht ist.{/n} "Nur ein weiterer? Mein Name erklingt wird in jeder Bucht auf diesem Schiff. Ich bin mehr als nur 'ein weiterer Emporkömmling'. Ich bin Eure Todesstrafe!"

languages.text: {n}Nemesitio sisea, furioso, sin darse cuenta de que su agarre del arma ha variado ligeramente.{/n} «¿Solo soy otro? Soy mucho más que "otro advenedizo". Mi nombre recorre la nave. ¡Soy tu sentencia de muerte!».
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemesitio sisea, furioso, sin darse cuenta de que su agarre del arma ha variado ligeramente.{/n} «¿Solo soy otro? Soy mucho más que "otro advenedizo". Mi nombre recorre la nave. ¡Soy tu sentencia de muerte!».

languages.text: {n}ネメサイトは怒りに声を上げ、武器を握る力がわずかに変わったことに気づいていない。{/n}「また？私の名前はこの船のすべてのベイで噂になっている。『ただの成り上がり』以上の存在だ。お前に死刑を宣告する者だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ネメサイトは怒りに声を上げ、武器を握る力がわずかに変わったことに気づいていない。{/n}「また？私の名前はこの船のすべてのベイで噂になっている。『ただの成り上がり』以上の存在だ。お前に死刑を宣告する者だ！」

languages.text: {n}涅墨斯特发出了愤怒的嘶嘶声，全然没有留意到他握着武器的手已经悄悄偏离了目标。{/n}“‘不过’？‘又是个‘？我的名字传遍了这艘船的每个角落。我才不是什么‘又是个耍嘴皮子的家伙’，我是你的刽子手！”
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}涅墨斯特发出了愤怒的嘶嘶声，全然没有留意到他握着武器的手已经悄悄偏离了目标。{/n}“‘不过’？‘又是个‘？我的名字传遍了这艘船的每个角落。我才不是什么‘又是个耍嘴皮子的家伙’，我是你的刽子手！”

languages.text: {n}Némésite siffle de colère sans remarquer qu'il tient son revolver avec moins d'assurance.{/n} « Juste un de plus ? Mon nom circule sur tous les ponts de ce vaisseau. Je suis bien davantage qu'un "arriviste de plus". Je suis votre condamnation à mort ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Némésite siffle de colère sans remarquer qu'il tient son revolver avec moins d'assurance.{/n} « Juste un de plus ? Mon nom circule sur tous les ponts de ce vaisseau. Je suis bien davantage qu'un ‘arriviste de plus'. Je suis votre condamnation à mort ! »

languages.text: {n}Nemezit, kızgınlıkla tıslıyor. Silahı üzerindeki elinin hafifçe kaydığını fark etmiyor.{/n} "Küstahlardan biri miyim? Benim ismim, bu geminin her bölmesinde yankılanıyor. Ben, 'çenesi düşük küstahtan' çok daha fazlasıyım. Senin ölüm fermanınım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite hisses in anger, not noticing that his grip on the weapon has shifted slightly.{/n} "Just another? My name is spoken in every bay on this ship. I am more than 'just another upstart.' I am your death sentence!"
